media:group.media:title: The Summer of Math Exposition
media:group.media:description:
Announcement for the 2021 Summer of Math Exposition
Podcast/New channel: https://www.youtube.com/GrantSanderson
Details: https://3b1b.co/SoME1

https://www.youtube.com/user/LeiosOS

0:00 - SoME1
5:30 - The universal advice
8:20 - Structuring math explanations
18:30 - Math animation software
22:06 - The 3b1b podcast

3blue1brown is a channel about animating math, in all senses of the word animate.  And you know the drill with YouTube, if you want to stay posted on new videos, subscribe: http://3b1b.co/subscribe
